credit_line: Gift of Hiram Butler MA 1979 in honor of John R. Lane, Class of 1966 and Earl A. Powell III, Class of 1966
title: Bridge Chair with Shadow (from "The Days Before: Death, Destruction & Detroit III")
description: From a production who's theme revolved around the end of the world and apocalyptic issues. Some parts were influenced by Y2K and the text was partially written by Umberto Eco.
